      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void createTableForDDF(String tableName) 
      DDF sql2ddf(String command)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF which already has a schema to govern the data loading, from the system default data source, using its default Schema.DataFormat.
      DDF sql2ddf(String command, Schema.DataFormat dataFormat)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF, using the specified Schema.DataFormat, from the system default data source.
      DDF sql2ddf(String command, Schema schema)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF using the given Schema, from the system default data source.
      DDF sql2ddf(String command, Schema schema, Schema.DataFormat dataFormat)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF using the given Schema, from the specified dataSource.
      DDF sql2ddf(String command, Schema schema, String dataSource)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF using the given Schema, from the specified source.
      DDF sql2ddf(String command, Schema schema, String dataSource, Schema.DataFormat dataFormat)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF using the given Schema, from the specified dataSource.
      List<String> sql2txt(String command)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a List with default size which already has a schema to govern the data loading, from the system default data source, using its default Schema.DataFormat.
      List<String> sql2txt(String command, Integer maxRows)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a List which already has a schema to govern the data loading, from the system default data source, using its default Schema.DataFormat.
      List<String> sql2txt(String command, Integer maxRows, String dataSource)
      Executes the given command and stores the results into a List using the given Schema, from the specified source.

      • sql2ddf

        public DDF sql2ddf(String command,
          Schema schema,
          String dataSource)
            throws DDFException
        Description copied from interface: IHandleSqlLike
        Executes the given command and stores the results into a DDF using the given Schema, from the specified source. The Schema.DataFormat is assumed to be whatever is the default provided by the data source.
        schema - If Schema is null, then the data is expected to have Schema information available
        dataSource - The dataSource (URI) of the data, e.g., jdbc://xxx
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DDFException
